programme.title: CBS News 24/7 Primetime
programme.desc: 24/7 Primetime is your essential daily guide to all the stories shaping your world. Anchored by CBS News' Elizabeth Cook, the show delivers the news you need to know.

programme.title: The Daily Report
programme.desc: The Daily Report on CBS News features original interviews and insights on the most important, urgent and interesting stories of the day.

programme.title: CBS Evening News
programme.desc: The CBS Evening News team shares the day's stories, delivering context and depth to bring greater understanding to the world.

programme.title: CBS Evening News Plus
programme.desc: John Dickerson will guide viewers through the most impactful and important news of the day using in-depth conversations with CBS News journalists and contributors, as well as original reporting on national issues.

programme.title: The Takeout with Major Garrett
programme.desc: The Takeout is a new spin on the widely acclaimed podcast hosted by CBS News Chief Washington Correspondent Major Garrett. A daily streaming show that harnesses the best of CBS News's political reporting and lives comfortably in deep discussions of economics, pop culture, sports and technology.

programme.title: CBS Saturday Morning
programme.desc: Co-hosts Dana Jacobson and Michelle Miller provide original reporting, breaking news, and profiles of leading figures in culture and the arts from the Times Square studio on the Saturday edition of the CBS morning news family.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: This newsmagazine investigates intriguing crime and justice cases that touch on all aspects of the human experience. Over its long run, the show has helped exonerate wrongly convicted people, driven the reopening -- and resolution -- of cold cases, and changed numerous lives. CBS News correspondents offer an in-depth look into each story, with the emphasis on solving the mystery at its heart. The program and its team have earned critical acclaim, including multiple Emmy, Peabody and Edward R. Murrow Awards.
